org.jasig.cas.authentication

Class PrincipalException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.jasig.cas.authentication.AuthenticationException
          • org.jasig.cas.authentication.PrincipalException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MixedPrincipalException, UnresolvedPrincipalException

    public class PrincipalException
extends AuthenticationException
    Describes a principal resolution error, which is a subcategory of authentication error. Principal resolution necessarily happens after successful authentication for a given credential.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
